sentences.english: Like a coating of glaze over earthenware are fervent lips with an evil heart.
sentences.chinese: 火熱的嘴，奸惡的心，好像銀渣包的瓦器。

sentences.english: If a ruler hearken to lies, all his servants are wicked.
sentences.chinese: 君王若聽謊言，他一切臣僕都是奸惡。

sentences.english: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.
sentences.chinese: 他們的手中有奸惡，右手滿有賄賂。

sentences.english: Woe to them that devise iniquity, and work evil upon their beds!
sentences.chinese: 禍哉，那些在牀上圖謀罪孽，造作奸惡的。

sentences.english: I look on the faithless with loathing, for they do not obey your word.
sentences.chinese: 我看見奸惡的人，就甚憎惡，因爲他們不遵守你的話。

sentences.english: If a ruler listens to lies, all his officials become wicked.
sentences.chinese: 君王若聽謊言，他一切臣僕都是奸惡。

sentences.english: Scoundrels concoct evil, and their speech is like a scorching fire.
sentences.chinese: 匪徒圖謀奸惡，嘴上彷彿有燒焦的火。

sentences.english: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.
sentences.chinese: 他們心中圖謀奸惡，常常聚集要爭戰。

sentences.english: An ungodly man diggeth up evil: and in his lips there is as a burning fire.
sentences.chinese: 匪徒圖謀奸惡，嘴上彷佛有燒焦的火。

sentences.english: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.
sentences.chinese: 我看見奸惡的人，就甚憎惡，因爲他們不遵守你的話。

sentences.english: He looked upon Cowperwood now as a dark and dangerous man.
sentences.chinese: 現在他認爲柯帕烏是奸惡而危險的人物。

sentences.english: 10in whose hands are wicked schemes, whose right hands are full of bribes.
sentences.chinese: 他們的手中有奸惡，右手滿有賄賂。

sentences.english: No misfortune is seen in Jacob, no misery observed in Israel.
sentences.chinese: 他未見雅各中有罪孽，也未見以色列中有奸惡。

sentences.english: If a ruler hearken to lies, all his servants [are] wicked.
sentences.chinese: 君王若聽謊言，他一切臣僕都是奸惡。
